greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: n^2 * a(n) = 3*(39*n^2 - 52*n + 20) * a(n-1) - 441*(3*n-4)^2 * a(n-2), with a(0)=1, a(1)=21.
link: Gheorghe Coserea, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..201
Robert S. Maier, On Rationally Parametrized Modular Equations, arXiv:math/0611041 [math.NT], 2006.
program: (MAGMA) I:=[21,693]; [1] cat [n le 2 select I[n] else (3*(39*n^2-52*n+20)*Self(n-1)-441*(3*n-4)^2*Self(n-2)) div n^2: n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 25 2016
results.author: _Gheorghe Coserea_, Aug 23 2016
